block.spikyspikes.diamond_spike.descript: Deals a lot of damage, mobs drop all loot like when killed by a player. Can use most sword enchantments, apply via an anvil.
block.spikyspikes.golden_spike.descripti: Damages and kills mobs, only drops experience without any loot.
block.spikyspikes.iron_spike.description: Damages and kills mobs, only drops normal loot without experience.
block.spikyspikes.netherite_spike.descri: Deals a lot of damage, mobs drop all loot like when killed by a player. Can use most sword enchantments, apply via an anvil. Is resistant to explosions and cannot be destroyed by the wither boss. Deals no damage to players.
block.spikyspikes.stone_spike.descriptio: Damages and kills mobs, but does not drop any loot or experience.
block.spikyspikes.wooden_spike.descripti: Slowly damages mobs, but does not deal a killing blow.
death.attack.spike: %1$s now rests in a less spiky world
death.attack.spike.player: %1$s oversaw a spike trying to flee from %2$s
